title: Pampas Grass Removed - Gravel Garden Added
subtitle: A full garden transformation in Newquay, Cornwall — pampas grass removed, ground prepared, weed membrane installed, and a clean gravel finish with a new patio area.

seo.title: Gravel Garden & Patio Transformation in Newquay
seo.description: See how we transformed an overgrown garden in Newquay, Cornwall by removing pampas grass and creating a low-maintenance gravel garden with a fresh patio area.
seo.ogTitle: Before & After: Gravel Garden with Patio (Newquay)
seo.ogDescription: Pampas grass removed and replaced with a tidy, low-maintenance gravel garden and patio — a clean, modern outdoor space built to last.

hero.imageAlt: Brand new gravel garden with new patio

overview.label: Project overview
paragraphs: This Newquay garden was dominated by overgrown pampas grass and untidy planting, making the space hard to use and difficult to maintain.
We cleared the area back, removed the pampas grass, then prepared and levelled the ground ready for a long-lasting, low-maintenance finish.
To complete the transformation, we installed weed membrane and a gravel surface, alongside a fresh patio area — creating a clean, practical outdoor space that looks great year-round.

whatWeDid.label: What we did
bullets: Removed pampas grass and cleared overgrown vegetation
Prepared and levelled the ground for a stable finish
Installed weed membrane to help prevent regrowth
Added gravel for a clean, modern and low-maintenance surface
Created a new patio area for seating and usability
Removed waste and left the site tidy

result.label: The result
bullets: A dramatically cleaner garden with a fresh, modern look
A low-maintenance gravel surface that’s easy to keep tidy
Improved usability with a dedicated patio seating area
Reduced weed pressure thanks to membrane and proper preparation
A brighter, more open space that’s ready to enjoy

faq.question: How long does a gravel garden transformation take?
faq.answer: Most gravel garden projects can be completed in a few days, depending on access, the amount of clearance required, and whether patio works are included. We’ll confirm timings after a site visit or photos.

faq.question: Will weeds grow through the gravel?
faq.answer: A properly installed weed membrane and good ground preparation greatly reduces weeds. Some surface weeds can still appear over time (often from wind-blown seeds), but they’re usually quick to remove.

faq.question: How do I maintain a gravel garden?
faq.answer: Gravel gardens are generally low maintenance. Occasional raking, removing debris, and topping up gravel when needed will keep the area looking sharp.

faq.question: Can you add a patio or path as part of the project?
faq.answer: Yes — we can design and install patios, paths, and edging to make the space more usable and create a clean finish between areas.
